titleStmt.title: A commentarie or exposition upon the prophecie of Habakkuk together with many usefull and very seasonable observations / delivered in sundry sermons preacht in the church of St. James Garlick-hith London, many yeeres since, by Edward Marbury ...
titleStmt.author: Marbury, Edward, 1581-ca. 1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed T.R. and E.M. for Octavian Pullen, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages bound out of order, with print show-through and slight loss of print; p. 225-226 torn with some loss of print, p. 214-237 from Harvard University Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
